name: Long-Wear Waterproof Cream Eyeshadow Stick
ingredients: Methyl Trimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Wax, Lauroyl Lysine, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Stearoxymethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax Copernicia Cerifera Cera Cire De Carnauba, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Polyethylene, Microcrystalline WaxCera MicrocristallinaCire Microcristalline, Isostearic Acid, Dicalcium Phosphate, Lecithin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate,  [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Chromium Hydroxide Green (Ci 77289), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Carmine (Ci 75470), Copper Powder (Ci 77400), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Bronze Powder (Ci 77400)]...Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, refer to the product packaging.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Swipe the eyeshadow stick across your eyelids and blend with your fingertips for instant color, or create a base with a neutral shade and layer on pops of color for limitless looks. Because this eyeshadow is waterproof, it should be removed with a long-wearing makeup remover as it won't come off with just soap and water. Playing up eyes has never been so easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This goes on very smooth. The colour is goes from pink to orange with just the right amount of shimmer.

Love the color and doesn’t budge once it sets but I won’t buy again because every single one of the Bobby brown eyeshadow sticks break and fall out. It’s very pricey for it to break so easily. I moved onto another brand which I haven’t had that issue and cost less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the formula. It is so easy to use, can blend with my fingers or a fluffy shadow brush and it looks like I know to use eyeshadow. Beautiful shimmery cool leaning neutral shade. This looks fantastic on brown eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, but they are not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Second time it breaks/falls apart.  Unfortunately, out of the range for return...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I returned this product.  It's very glittery and the gold is so faint it barely shows up.  I was disappointed in this product.  I usually am a big fan of Bobbi Brown Cream eyeshadow sticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shadow sticks but something is off with the Gold shade. The payoff and the longevity are incredibly poor. Really disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Color: Perfect everyday smokey eye without being too heavy or dark.  Easy to apply and build upon for subtle or more intense color. Somewhat long lasting, but it does fade as the day goes on. Product consistency feels really nice on eyelids, though! Super silky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi brown is the best stick eyeshadow!! Stays all day!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No other eyeshadow stick applies like this one. It is so pigmented, glides on so smooth and easy,layers well with other products , and has great staying power. This product has saved me so much time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love eye makeup and BB is a staple. This stick is so easy to apply and blends smoothly.  It is practically impossible to mess up a smokey eye. Will make blue eyes pop. The color is more brown than plum  The colors is more brown than plum an blue eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 100/10 one of my favorite makeup products. Sadly due to the cost I likely won’t get it again but it’s really amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews, but this silver shadow (Iced) is SO pretty! It is bright and crease proof and looks pretty applied with a light touch for workdays or heavy swipes for weekend. Definitely a great impulse purchase! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color is absolutely beautiful and this is so easy to use. You can create beautiful eye looks like a pro!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini duo (Moonstone & Golden Bronze) and absolutely loved them, so decided to splurge on a full-size in a different color (Incandescent). What a huge disappointment. The color is so different from what's shown in the photos it almost feels fraudulent. It's extremely sheer, doesn't blend at all (even with a good primer) and creases horribly. It's more like a very sheer highlighter but it's too thick and smudgy to even use for that. I don't know if mine was expired or tainted in some way, but I will never purchase again. The two colors in the mini duo set are fantastic. But the full-sized incandescent is so bad it's not even funny. Why would I spend $35 on a product that looks nothing like the photos? I mean what the actual heck? Do better Bobbi Brown. Stuff like this makes loyal customers lose trust in your brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best eyeshadow sticks on the market. They are SPARKLY, so if you’re not into that, avoid. Other than that, the pigmentation is superb and buildable. I want every color!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Moonstone - pale neutral with a silvery gold sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the color, but it is way too sparkly.  Fair, red head, blue eyes, 40yo

reviews.review_title: It broke after a few uses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the product until the tip just fell out into the sink and rendered it useless. I had only been using it a little while so the product was wasted.
